pageContext.description: What remains of the hilt is hollow and it was cast with the blade.
pageContext.associations: With B.67, may be part of the Flixborough Hoard recorded in Archaeological Journal, 1872, vol. xxix, p. 194, but for which no definite information was available when given to the Museum. Flixborough is on the Normanby Estate.
pageContext.publications: H.E. Dudley "Early Days in N.W. Lincolnshire", p. 92, fig. 33, No. 17
pageContext.collection: Scunthorpe Museum,Group No. 66, a, b, & c,(Donor: Late Sir Berkeley Sheffield)
pageContext.toSearch: Flixborough, Scunthorpe, North Lincolnshire Dn15, UK
